name: tosoh-functions
description: Build pipeline for HubSpot serverless functions

scripts.build: bun run clean && bun run build:ts && bun run copy:files && bun run copy:config
scripts.deploy: bun run build && bun run upload
scripts.deploy:staging: bun run build && bun run upload --account=tosoh-sandbox
scripts.deploy:production: bun run build && bun run upload --account=production
